title: We ‘interviewed’ Harriet Tubman using AI. It got a little weird.
description: A new tool from Khan Academy lets students talk with simulations of Tubman, Winston Churchill, Genghis Khan and more. But there’s a limit.

title: AI learned from their work. Now they want compensation.
description: Authors, artists and publishers are suing tech companies that used copyrighted works to train their artificial intelligence programs.
